item.title: Acquire information from the Japan Meteorological Agency and notify Slack of weather alerts for the 23 wards of Tokyo
item.description: Domo, good evening! This is the 5th day article of Zapier Advent Calendar 2019. This time, Want to detect the weather warning of 23 wards as soon as possible! I would like to refer to more probable information instead of the third party API! I made a little Zap, so I will introduce it. I’m streaming this into Slack :point_down: Overview of Zap We use the data provided by the Japan Meteorological Agency to obtain weather information, and send it to Slack by filtering and parsing it in Python.
